languages.text: "Полетай по округе, разомни крылья. Пусть люди вдохновятся твоим величием".
languages.translation_comment:
Опция недоступна, если у игрока 2 марка Хаоса
После этого ансвера — затемнение

Опция недоступна, если у игрока 2 марка Хаоса
После этого ансвера — затемнение

languages.text: "Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."
languages.original_text: "Полетай по округе, разомни крылья. Пусть люди вдохновятся твоим величием".

traits.locale_text: "Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."
"Do a circle around the deck, stretch your wings. Let the crew be inspired by your majesty."
"Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."
"Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."
"Do a circle around the deck and stretch your wings. Let the crew be inspired by your majesty."
"Do a circle around the deck and stretch your wings. Let the crew be inspired by your majesty."
"Do a circle around the deck and stretch your wings. Let the crew be inspired by your majesty."
"Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."

languages.text: 「デッキをひと回りして、羽を伸ばしておいで。君の威厳でクルーたちを鼓舞してやってくれ」
languages.original_text: "Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."

traits.locale_text: 「デッキをひと回りして、羽を伸ばしておいで。君の威厳でクルーたちを鼓舞してやってくれ」

languages.text: "Dreh eine Runde und breite deine Flügel aus. Inspiriere die Leute mit deiner Erhabenheit."
languages.original_text: "Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."

traits.locale_text: "Dreh eine Runde und breite deine Flügel aus. Inspiriere die Leute mit deiner Erhabenheit."

languages.text: « Va faire un tour pour étirer tes ailes. Ta majesté ne manquera pas d'inspirer le petit peuple. »
languages.original_text: "Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."

traits.locale_text: « Va faire un tour pour étirer tes ailes. Ta majesté ne manquera pas d'inspirer le petit peuple. »

languages.text: «Echa a volar y estira las alas. Que tu majestuosidad inspire a la gente».
languages.original_text: "Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."

traits.locale_text: «Echa a volar y estira las alas. Que tu majestuosidad inspire a la gente».

languages.text: “出去飞一圈，伸展一下翅膀吧，用你的英姿鼓舞所有船员。”
languages.original_text: "Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."

traits.locale_text: “出去飞一圈，伸展一下翅膀吧，用你的英姿鼓舞所有船员。”

languages.text: "Etrafta uçup kanatlarını esnet. İnsanlar heybetinden feyzalsın."
languages.original_text: "Fly around and stretch your wings. Let people be inspired by your majesty."

traits.locale_text: "Etrafta uçup kanatlarını esnet. İnsanlar heybetinden feyzalsın."
